title: An NFT That Saves Lives
title_zh: [待翻译] An NFT That Saves Lives

paragraphs: May 2021Noora Health, a nonprofit I've supported for years, just launched a new NFT. It has a dramatic name, Save Thousands of Lives, because that's what the proceeds will do.Noora has been saving lives for 7 years.

They run programs in hospitals in South Asia to teach new mothers how to take care of their babies once they get home. They're in 165 hospitals now. And because they know the numbers before and after they start at a new hospital, they can measure the impact they have.

It is massive. For every 1000 live births, they save 9 babies.This number comes from a study of 133,733 families at 28 different hospitals that Noora conducted in collaboration with the Better Birth team at Ariadne Labs, a joint center for health systems innovation at Brigham and Women’s Hospital and Harvard T.H.

Chan School of Public Health.Noora is so effective that even if you measure their costs in the most conservative way, by dividing their entire budget by the number of lives saved, the cost of saving a life is the lowest I've seen.

$1,235.For this NFT, they're going to issue a public report tracking how this specific tranche of money is spent, and estimating the number of lives saved as a result.NFTs are a new territory, and this way of using them is especially new, but I'm excited about its potential.

And I'm excited to see what happens with this particular auction, because unlike an NFT representing something that has already happened, this NFT gets better as the price gets higher.The reserve price was about $2.5 million, because that's what it takes for the name to be accurate: that's what it costs to save 2000 lives.
But the higher the price of this NFT goes, the more lives will be saved. What a sentence to be able to write.

paragraphs.original: May 2021Noora Health, a nonprofit I've supported for years, just launched a new NFT. It has a dramatic name, Save Thousands of Lives, because that's what the proceeds will do.Noora has been saving lives for 7 years.
paragraphs.translated: 2021年5月，我支持多年的非营利组织Noora Health刚刚推出了一款新的NFT。它有一个引人注目的名字——拯救数千生命，因为所得款项将用于这一目的。Noora已经拯救生命7年了。

paragraphs.original: They run programs in hospitals in South Asia to teach new mothers how to take care of their babies once they get home. They're in 165 hospitals now. And because they know the numbers before and after they start at a new hospital, they can measure the impact they have.
paragraphs.translated: 他们在南亚的医院里运行项目，教授新妈妈们回家后如何照顾她们的宝宝。现在，他们已经在165家医院开展项目。由于他们在新医院开始项目前后都有数据，因此可以衡量项目的影响力。

paragraphs.original: It is massive. For every 1000 live births, they save 9 babies.This number comes from a study of 133,733 families at 28 different hospitals that Noora conducted in collaboration with the Better Birth team at Ariadne Labs, a joint center for health systems innovation at Brigham and Women’s Hospital and Harvard T.H.
paragraphs.translated: 这个数字非常可观。每1000名活产婴儿中，他们能救活9名。这一数据来自诺拉与阿里阿德涅实验室的“更好出生”团队合作开展的一项研究，该研究涵盖了28家不同医院的133,733个家庭。阿里阿德涅实验室是布里格姆妇科医院和哈佛大学T.H.陈公共卫生学院联合成立的健康系统创新中心。

paragraphs.original: Chan School of Public Health.Noora is so effective that even if you measure their costs in the most conservative way, by dividing their entire budget by the number of lives saved, the cost of saving a life is the lowest I've seen.
paragraphs.translated: 陈公共卫生学院的诺拉项目非常有效，即使你以最保守的方式衡量其成本，即将其全部预算除以所拯救的生命数量，拯救一个生命的成本也是我所见过的最低的。

paragraphs.original: $1,235.For this NFT, they're going to issue a public report tracking how this specific tranche of money is spent, and estimating the number of lives saved as a result.NFTs are a new territory, and this way of using them is especially new, but I'm excited about its potential.
paragraphs.translated: 1,235美元。对于这个NFT，他们将发布一份公开报告，追踪这笔特定资金的使用情况，并估算因此拯救的生命数量。NFT是一个新领域，而这种使用方式尤其新颖，但我对其潜力感到兴奋。

paragraphs.original: And I'm excited to see what happens with this particular auction, because unlike an NFT representing something that has already happened, this NFT gets better as the price gets higher.The reserve price was about $2.5 million, because that's what it takes for the name to be accurate: that's what it costs to save 2000 lives.
paragraphs.translated: 我对此拍卖的结果感到兴奋，因为与代表已经发生的事情的NFT不同，这个NFT的价格越高，其价值就越大。保留价约为250万美元，因为这个名字要准确，就需要这么多钱：这正是拯救2000条生命所需的成本。

paragraphs.original: But the higher the price of this NFT goes, the more lives will be saved. What a sentence to be able to write.
paragraphs.translated: 但这个NFT的价格越高，就能拯救越多的生命。能写下这样的句子真好。
